title: Before We Begin
description: I'd like to share a story with youâ€”a tale of the Kubernetes Community Days. This marks our second event, unfolding once again in Lahore, made possible by your invaluable support and the contributions of many to this vibrant ecosystem. As a team, we've poured our hearts and souls into this endeavor, driven by a fervent desire to empower our local community with knowledge and resources on Kubernetes. Before the inception of the Kubernetes Community Days, we realized a significant gap: many, including professionals, were unfamiliar with "Kubernetes." Mentioning the name often elicited puzzled looks and curious questions: "Kubernetes? What's that?"

title: What You Will Learn
description: By the end of this bootcamp, you will have a solid understanding of what Kubernetes is and what it does. Specifically, you will learn how to:
